title: Mining men
creator_credit: Lilias Fraser, Norman Castle and Conzinc Riotinto of Australia
brief_description: Describes the opportunities available for young men in the mining industry. It outlines the work of the graduate geologist, the mining engineer, the metallurgist and others and gives a comprehensive picture of life and work in new and developing mining communities of Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Lilias Fraser, Norman Castle and Conzinc Riotinto of Australia
